player.name: Hakeem Olajuwon
player.physicalDescription: 7'0" center, long graceful limbs, kind intelligent eyes, lean athletic build for a big man
player.archetype: The Dream, graceful giant who dominated through footwork and faith

figure.name: Abraham
figure.attributeDescription: weathered wooden staff of a wandering patriarch, symbol of the journey from Ur to Canaan
figure.clothing: flowing desert robes in earth tones, head covering for sun, simple sandals, clothing of a wealthy nomad
figure.physicalDescription: elderly but vigorous patriarch, long white beard, weathered sun-darkened skin, kind wise eyes that have seen visions, dignified bearing
figure.anatomyNote: two arms, often holding staff or raised in blessing
figure.archetype: Father of Nations, the first to answer God's call

connection.thematic: Both called from distant lands to become founders of dynasties through faith
connection.narrative: From Nigeria to Houston. From Ur to Canaan. Journeys of faith.
connection.relationship: Faithful pioneers who left everything to answer a greater calling

interactions.description: Standing as fellow travelers, both far from their birthplace
Two pillars of faith, protecting what they built
Hakeem executing Dream Shake while Abraham journeys forth
